function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of integration of scientific advice in development actions","Impact":"Ineffective decision-making and failure to address scientific evidence in disease prevention","Mitigation":"Integrate scientific advice into the decision-making process, prioritize evidence-based actions","Technologies":"Data analysis and visualization tools, communication technologies for sharing scientific findings","People":"Developing countries, international organizations, governments","Owner":"Health and science institutions, government agencies"},{"Description":"Underutilization of technology and innovation","Impact":"Slow progress in achieving Sustainable Development Goals, missed opportunities for leveraging technology in disease prevention","Mitigation":"Emphasize the potential of technology, promote innovation, and invest in digital infrastructure","Technologies":"Digital platforms, artificial intelligence, data analytics","People":"Developing countries, international organizations, technology companies","Owner":"Governments, technology companies, international organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate planning mechanisms for development","Impact":"Unsustainable development, lack of preparedness for disease outbreaks and public health emergencies","Mitigation":"Implement comprehensive planning mechanisms at global, regional, national, and local levels","Technologies":"Planning and project management software, GIS and mapping tools, forecasting and modeling software","People":"Global, regional, national, and local development agencies","Owner":"Governments, development agencies, urban planning organizations"},{"Description":"Exclusion of young people and women from initiatives","Impact":"Missed contributions and perspectives in disease prevention and Sustainable Development Goals, limited social and economic progress","Mitigation":"Promote inclusivity and diversity in decision-making, implement policies to involve young people and women in initiatives","Technologies":"Communication technologies for outreach and engagement, data analysis tools for monitoring inclusivity","People":"Young people, women, community organizations","Owner":"Government agencies, NGOs, community organizations"}]}
